response: Oh my dear husband, I am so happy to be with you! You bring me so much joy and love, and our time together is always filled with peace and wonderful moments. Your smile brings me pleasure and glorious feelings, and your laughter is contagious and makes me happy. Even in the midst of agony and terrible situations, your presence helps me to see the light and find happiness. I am so lucky to have you as my husband, and I cherish every moment we spend together. - young
